description:
This is an extension for [Manim](https://chocolatey.org/packages/manim). This contain LaTeX just enough to run Manim and also lightweight(Around 250MB) and portable.	
	This package works for both [3b1b's version of Manim](https://github.com/3b1b/manim) and [Community version of Manim](https://github.com/manimcommunity/manim).
	
	Note: This is based of [TinyTeX](https://chocolatey.org/packages/tinytex) with extra dependency required for Manim.
	Please inform maintainers as this is an [automatic package](https://chocolatey.org/docs/automatic-packages).
summary: Lightweight and portable LaTeX distribution, just enough for Manim based on TeX Live
author: Naveen M K,  Yihui Xie,  TeX Live Developers
